title: Macintosh Postscript vs Windows Truetype
content: I want to buy [this font](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524123142/http:/youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0016) which is offered in two formats: "Macintosh Postscript" and "Windows Truetype". I want to get a postscript font if possible, but I want it to be usable on PCs as well. Is Macintosh Postscript really only for Macintosh? Would it be impolite to ask the company for a Windows Postscript font?
author: kidbritish

comments.content: For 100 dollars I'd say they'd better offer a Windows PS version.
